bill.summary:
Pay for Printing Act
This bill requires the sponsor of a ceremonial or commemorative Senate resolution to reimburse the Government Publishing Office for the total costs of printing the resolution out of the sponsor's Senators' Official Personnel and Office Expense Account.
It excludes from such requirement a resolution sponsored by at least two-thirds of the Senators.
